tool_description: Get past, present and future holiday data for any country. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/holidays.
title: Holidays by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/holidays

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Calendar year between 2010 and 2030 (inclusive). Note: not all countries are guaranteed contain data going back to 2010.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country name or ISO 3166-2 country code (preferred).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Holiday type filter. Possible values are:

- public_holiday
- observance
- national_holiday
- season
- state_holiday
- optional_holiday
- clock_change_daylight_saving_time
- local_holiday
- united_nations_observance
- observance_christian
- bank_holiday
- common_local_holiday
- national_holiday_christian
- christian
- observance_hebrew
- jewish_holiday
- muslim
- hindu_holiday
- restricted_holiday
- official_holiday
- national_holiday_orthodox
- local_observance
-

utterances.utterance: What are the public holidays in Canada for the year 2023?
List all national holidays in Germany for the year 2022.
Show me the bank holidays in the United Kingdom for 2024.
What are the federal holidays in the United States for the year 2021?
List all Christian observances in Italy for the year 2025.
What are the Jewish holidays in Israel for the year 2023?
Show me the Hindu holidays in India for the year 2022.
List all Muslim holidays in Saudi Arabia for the year 2024.
What are the local observances in Japan for the year 2023?
Show me the United Nations observances in France for the year 2025.
